verses.t: Know ye not{G50}, brethren{G80}, (for{G1063} I speak{G2980} to them that know{G1097} the law{G3551},) how that{G3754} the law{G3588} hath dominion over{G2961} a man{G3588} as{G3745} long{G5550} as{G3745} he liveth{G2198}?

For{G1063} the woman{G1135} which hath an husband{G5220} is bound{G1210} by the law{G3551} to{G435} her husband{G435} so long as he liveth{G2198}; but{G1161} if{G1437} the husband{G3588} be dead{G599}, she is loosed{G2673} from{G575} the law{G3588} of{G3588} her husband{G435}.

So{G686} then{G3767} if{G1437}, while{G2198} her husband{G3588} liveth{G2198}, she be married{G1096} to{G435} another{G2087} man{G435}, she shall be called{G5537} an adulteress{G3428}: but{G1161} if{G1437} her husband{G3588} be dead{G599}, she is{G2076} free{G1658} from{G575} that law{G3588}; so that{G3588} she{G846} is{G1511} no{G3361} adulteress{G3428}, though she be married{G1096} to{G435} another{G2087} man{G435}.

Wherefore{G5620}, my{G3450} brethren{G80}, ye{G5210} also{G2532} are become dead{G2289} to the law{G3588} by{G1223} the body{G3588} of Christ{G3588}; that{G1519} ye{G5209} should be married{G1096} to another{G2087}, even to him who is raised{G1453} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}, that{G2443} we should bring forth fruit{G2592} unto God{G3588}.

For{G1063} when{G3753} we were{G1510} in{G1722} the flesh{G3588}, the motions{G3588} of sins{G3588}, which were{G3588} by{G1223} the law{G3588}, did work{G1754} in{G1722} our{G2257} members{G3588} to{G1519} bring forth fruit{G2592} unto death{G3588}.

But{G1161} now{G3570} we are delivered{G2673} from{G575} the law{G3588}, that being dead{G599} wherein{G1722} we were held{G2722}that{G5620} we{G2248} should serve{G1398} in{G1722} newness{G2538} of spirit{G4151}, and{G2532} not{G3756} in the oldness{G3821} of the letter{G1121}.?? Gk apoQanontes apoQanontos

What{G5101} shall we say{G2046} then{G3767}? Is the law{G3588} sin{G266}? God forbid{G1096}. Nay{G235}, I had{G1097} not{G3756} known{G1097} sin{G3588}, but{G3361} by{G1223} the law{G3551}: for{G1063} I had{G1492} not{G3756} known{G1492} lust{G1939}, except{G3361} the law{G3588} had said{G3004}, Thou shalt{G1937} not{G3756} covet{G1937}.

But{G1161} sin{G3588}, taking{G2983} occasion{G874} by{G1223} the commandment{G3588}, wrought{G2716} in{G1722} me{G1698} all manner of{G3956} concupiscence{G1939}. For{G1063} without{G5565} the law{G3551} sin{G266} was dead{G3498}.
For{G1161} I{G1473} was alive{G2198} without{G5565} the law{G3551} once{G4218}: but{G1161} when{G2064} the commandment{G3588} came{G2064}, sin{G3588} revived{G326}, and{G1161} I{G1473} died{G599}.
And{G2532} the commandment{G3588}, which{G3588} was ordained to{G1519} life{G2222}, I{G3427} found{G2147} to be unto{G1519} death{G2288}.
For{G1063} sin{G266}, taking{G2983} occasion{G874} by{G1223} the commandment{G3588}, deceived{G1818} me{G3165}, and{G2532} by{G1223} it{G846} slew{G615} me.
Wherefore{G5620} the law{G3551} is holy{G40}, and{G2532} the commandment{G3588} holy{G40}, and{G2532} just{G1342}, and{G2532} good{G18}.

Was{G1096} then{G3767} that which is good{G18} made{G1096} death{G2288} unto me{G1698}? God forbid{G1096}. But{G235} sin{G3588}, that{G2443} it might appear{G5316} sin{G266}, working{G2716} death{G2288} in me{G3427} by{G1223} that which is good{G18}; that{G2443} sin{G3588} by{G1223} the commandment{G3588} might become{G1096} exceeding{G5236} sinful{G268}.
For{G1063} we know{G1492} that{G3754} the law{G3588} is{G2076} spiritual{G4152}: but{G1161} I{G1473} am{G1510} carnal{G4559}, sold{G4097} under{G5259} sin{G3588}.

For{G1063} that which{G3739} I do{G2716} I allow{G1097} not{G3756}: for{G1063} what{G3739} I would{G2309}, that{G5124} do I{G4238} not{G3756}; but{G235} what{G3739} I hate{G3404}, that{G5124} do I{G4160}.
If{G1487} then{G1161} I do{G4160} that which{G3739} I would{G2309} not{G3756}, I consent unto{G4852} the law{G3588} that{G3754} it is good{G2570}.
Now{G3570} then{G1161} it is no more{G3765} I{G1473} that{G3765} do{G2716} it{G846}, but{G235} sin{G266} that dwelleth{G3611} in{G1722} me{G1698}.

For{G1063} I know{G1492} that{G3754} in{G1722} me{G1698} (that{G5124} is{G2076}, in{G1722} my{G3450} flesh{G3588},) dwelleth{G3611} no{G3756} good thing{G18}: for{G1063} to will{G2309} is present{G3873} with me{G3427}; but{G1161} how to perform{G2716} that which is good{G2570} I find{G2147} not{G3756}.
For{G1063} the good{G18} that{G3739} I would{G2309} I do{G4160} not{G3756}: but{G235} the evil{G2556} which{G3739} I would{G2309} not{G3756}, that{G5124} I do{G4238}.

Now{G1161} if{G1487} I do{G4160} that{G3739} I{G1473} would{G2309} not{G3756}, it is no more{G3765} I{G1473} that{G3765} do{G2716} it{G846}, but{G235} sin{G266} that dwelleth{G3611} in{G1722} me{G1698}.
I find{G2147} then{G686} a law{G3588}, that{G3754}, when{G2309} I{G1698} would{G2309} do{G4160} good{G2570}, evil{G2556} is present{G3873} with me{G1698}.
For{G1063} I delight{G4913} in the law{G3588} of God{G3588} after{G2596} the{G444} inward{G2080} man{G444}:

But{G1161} I see{G991} another{G2087} law{G3551} in{G1722} my{G3450} members{G3588}, warring against{G497} the law{G3588} of{G3588} my{G3450} mind{G3563}, and{G2532} bringing{G163} me{G3165} into captivity{G163} to the law{G3588} of sin{G3588} which is{G5607} in{G1722} my{G3450} members{G3588}.
O{G444} wretched{G5005} man{G444} that I am{G1473}! who{G5101} shall deliver{G4506} me{G3165} from{G1537} the body{G3588} of{G3588} this{G5127} death{G2288}?

I thank{G2168} God{G3588} through{G1223} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} our{G2257} Lord{G3588}. So{G686} then{G3767} with the mind{G3563} I{G1473} myself{G846} serve{G1398} the law{G3551} of God{G2316}; but{G1161} with the flesh{G4561} the law{G3551} of sin{G266}.
